data.title: Keywords table
data.statement:
Your goal is to display the content of one or multiple page(s) in a keywords table.
You're given the number of keywords per page [[M]], a list of keywords and a list of table pages [[P]] to display on.

<<Note:>> The list of pages [[P]] given <<may>> not be in order.
<<Note:>> You will never be asked to display the last page if it contains less than [[M]] keywords.

data.stubGenerator:
read M:int
read K:int
loop K read S:string(256)
read N:int
loopline N P:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[M]], the number of keywords per page
<<Line 2:>> An integer [[K]], the total number of keywords
<<[[K]] next lines:>> A list of keywords given line by line
<<Next line:>> An integer [[N]], the number of pages
<<Next line:>> A list of integers [[P]], the [[P]] pages to display
data.outputDescription: The table content at the [[P]] pages of [[M]] lines

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Your goal is to display the content of one or multiple page(s) in a keywords table.
You're given the number of keywords per page M, a list of keywords and a list of table pages P to display on.

Note: The list of pages P given may not be in order.
Note: You will never be asked to display the last page if it contains less than M keywords.
Input
Line 1: An integer M, the number of keywords per page
Line 2: An integer K, the total number of keywords
K next lines: A list of keywords given line by line
Next line: An integer N, the number of pages
Next line: A list of integers P, the P pages to display
Output
The table content at the P pages of M lines
Constraints
0 < P <= 100
0 < M <= 200
Example
Input
5
7
pick
some
pink
or
reddish
color
please
1
1
Output
pick
some
pink
or
reddish
